DOC.detailed_description: Hypoxia may occur rapid sequence intubation ( RSI ) emergency department patient ( 1-4 ) . This condition may increase risk patient suffer cardiac arrest secondary securing airway . A part RSI pre-oxygenation , define place patient 100 % fraction inspire O2 3 minute prior administer induction agent ( i.e . sedative neuromuscular blocker ) order increase amount oxygen present functional residual capacity patient lung prolong oxygen saturate apneic period endotracheal intubation ( 5-9 ) . The process entail leave patient high flow nasal cannula ( HFNC ) oxygen act visualize vocal cord place endotracheal tube . Over year practice start become common emergency department , operate room ICU 's world . The third question ask : diffuse apneic oxygenation increase time desaturation ?
